name: The Holy Grail (Matthew Bodenstein)
description:
“The Holy Grail” is a medieval-themed 2d side-scroller runner where the goal is to avoid all obstacles, collect potions, and 50 coins to beat the game. 

Controls

Action Keyboard JumpW Slide
SUse PowerQQuitESC

ASSETS: https://docs.google.com/document/d/17dVwKhuDokNy1aYTGL6qZUbvTuFAV8wLI3cAGSR06hY/edit?usp=sharing

This game was made for DATT 2300 Project 3!

Game created by Matthew Bodenstein (217996505)!
